description: Returns the autoshifts for an Amazon Web Services Region. By default, the call returns only ACTIVE autoshifts. Optionally, you can specify the status parameter to return COMPLETED autoshifts.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The items in the response list.

nested_items.name: awayFrom
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone (for example, use1-az1) that traffic is shifted away from for a resource when Amazon Web Services starts an autoshift. Until the autoshift ends, traffic for the resource is instead directed to other Availability Zones in the Amazon Web Services Region. An autoshift can end for a resource, for example, when Amazon Web Services ends the autoshift for the Availability Zone or when you disable zonal autoshift for the resource.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The time (in UTC) when the autoshift ended.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The time (in UTC) when the autoshift started.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Specifies that you want to receive the next page of results. Valid only if you received a nextToken response in the previous request. If you did, it indicates that more output is available. Set this parameter to the value provided by the previous call's nextToken response to request the next page of results.
